The artist may do his best to represent the things his eyes have never seen, but his representations are so far beneath the reality that I am 


                                     -106- 

pained as I behold them. Neither God nor heaven nor Christ, who is the image of the Father, can be truly represented by the art of man. If the Lord had thought it advisable to represent Christ in this way, His person would have been described in the writings of the apostle. In the words of the disciple John, Christ is presented before us: [John 1:1-14, quoted].
